mapper.sql: acaID, merID, AdminID, acaMerchant, acaStat, acaReallo, acaReaTime, acaaMerchant
mapper.insert: insert into Application (acaID, merID, AdminID, acaMerchant, acaStat, acaReallo, acaReaTime, acaaMerchant) values (#{acaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{merid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adminid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{acamerchant,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{acastat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acareallo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{acareatime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{acaamerchant,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update Application
merID = #{merid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AdminID = #{adminid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

acaReaTime = #{acareatime,jdbcType=DATE},

where acaID = #{acaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
